EmailInputEdit:
We sent to you attached a PDF with the specifications and IP addresses, that must match in your network to avoid future issues.


If you have any further questions or need additional assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out.
Probing Questions (Add Info):
How long has been Happening this issue?
This issue happens only with the 3hape software or other ones?
Have anything changed on the network or the commputer lin the last days?
Do you have more scanners?
How many computer do you use?
RC: There are country network restrictions on the network that disables the communication to the servers
Solution: we disabled the country network restrictions, and I am pleased to report that the software is now working as expected.
Step 10: temporary files removed and system file checker command runned in CMD
Step 11: Drivers Updated in the DELLsupport app
Step 13: services stopped, and a Repair runned of Unite software
Step 15: Asked the customer to talk with their IT team about possible Countrry Network Restrictions
Step 16: Sent to customer the PDF with the network requirements
Step 2: graphic card driver was updated, now all is up to date
Step 3: Issue happens only with the 3hape software
Step 4: looked for windows updates , now all is up to date
Step 5: looked for unite updates, now all is up to date
Step 6: speedtest runned and all is good
Step 7: the reliability was checked and all is good
